plot outline: A widowed Lakshmi belongs to a wealthy family living with her parents and two kids.Lakshmi is saved from goons by Narayn Patil who then frequently visits her house and gets closer to her parents and kids.Subhan Rao feels jealous of this and asks for explanation form Lakshmi's father.Narayan Patil then promises to marry Lakshmi in front of the village at first she rejects but gets married for the sake of her kids.After their marriage a robbery takes place in their house where Lakshmi's parents get killed and she finds solace in Narayan .Lakshmi to is soon abducted an taken to isolated spot by her kidnappers where Narayan rushes to her aid.But Lakshmi gets a shock of her life that everything was conspired by Narayan including the death of her parents as he always eyed their wealth.
title: Bharla Malwat Rakhtaana
plot: A widowed Lakshmi belongs to a wealthy family living with her parents and two kids.Lakshmi is saved from goons by Narayn Patil who then frequently visits her house and gets closer to her parents and kids.Subhan Rao feels jealous of this and asks for explanation form Lakshmi's father.Narayan Patil then promises to marry Lakshmi in front of the village at first she rejects but gets married for the sake of her kids.After their marriage a robbery takes place in their house where Lakshmi's parents get killed and she finds solace in Narayan .Lakshmi to is soon abducted an taken to isolated spot by her kidnappers where Narayan rushes to her aid.But Lakshmi gets a shock of her life that everything was conspired by Narayan including the death of her parents as he always eyed their wealth.::alex.mjacko@mypeepul.com
